channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Google Fonts
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Google Fonts

item.title: CVE-2021-24935|2024-08-03T19:49:13.517Z -- unknown -- wp%20google%20fonts
item.description: The WP Google Fonts WordPress plugin before 3.1.5 does not escape the googlefont_ajax_name and googlefont_ajax_family parameter of the googlefont_action AJAx action (available to any authenticated user) before outputing them in attributes, leading Reflected Cross-Site Scripting issues
